Name: Brujah
Description: Rebels and warriors, passionate and fierce in their beliefs.

Name: Gangrel
Description: Feral survivors with a deep connection to the natural world.

Name: Malkavian
Description: Insightful seers afflicted by supernatural madness.

Name: Nosferatu
Description: Hideous vampires skilled in stealth and information brokering.

Name: Toreador
Description: Artistic and charismatic vampires drawn to beauty and creation.

Name: Tremere
Description: Blood sorcerers with an affinity for magic and rigid hierarchy.

Name: Ventrue
Description: Noble rulers and leaders who seek control and stability.

Name: Caitiff
Description: Clanless vampires who often struggle to find their place.

Name: ThinBlood
Description: Weakened vampires of diluted blood with limited powers.

Name: Tzimisce
Description: Flesh-shaping vampires with a penchant for cruelty and control.

Name: Ravnos
Description: Tricksters and wanderers with the ability to create illusions.

Name: Salubri
Description: Spiritual healers and warriors seeking redemption.

Name: BanuHaqim
Description: Assassins and judges, known for their skills and blood sorcery.

Name: TheMinistery
Description: Deceptive vampires using liberation and seduction to gain power.

Name: Hecata
Description: The unified Clan of Death, necromancers obsessed with Oblivion.

Name: Lasombra
Description: Masters of shadow and darkness, manipulative and formidable.
